_xResult.title: Down the Hall Linen Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made linen midi dress with one-shoulder silhouette
_xResult.longdesc:
We love everything about the build of this custom made midi dress. Crafted out of 100% linen, this ultra-light dress will whisk you from summer brunch to afternoon BBQ pool party with the light-heartedness of a child’s summer fun. You can dress this stylish and effortlessly flowing piece with casual flats or fancier wedges.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
